comment: Hat X axis works as intended out-of-the-box
Hat Y axis works as intended out-of-the-box
Hat X axis works as intended out-of-the-box
Hat Y axis works as intended out-of-the-box
Joy-Con's X axis is combined gamepad's Y axis
Joy-Con's Y axis is combined gamepad's X axis, inverted
Joy-Con's Y axis is combined gamepad's Z axis
Joy-Con's X axis is combined gamepad's RZ axis, inverted
